alert.note: Alert for Gallia (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Gallia, Mason, northeastern Cabell, northern Putnam and west central Jackson Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 719 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Buffalo, or 7 miles north of Winfield, moving west at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Point Pleasant, Gallipolis, Buffalo, Henderson, Leon, Grimms Landing, Gallopolis Ferry, Southside, Fraziers Bottom and Ashton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
